title: Speed Up Pandas Operations
description: This lab guides you through various techniques to speed up operations on pandas DataFrame using Cython, Numba, and pandas.eval(). These techniques can provide significant speed improvements when working with large datasets.

meta.title: Accelerate Pandas Operations with Cython, Numba, and eval()
meta.description: Learn techniques to speed up pandas DataFrame operations using advanced tools like Cython, Numba, and pandas.eval().
meta.keywords: cython, python playground, pandas, numba, python, optimization, performance

i18n.title: Acelerar las Operaciones de Pandas
